Module com.staticconstants.flowpad.flowpad
Package com.staticconstants.flowpad.frontend.textarea

Class TextStyle

java.lang.Object
com.staticconstants.flowpad.frontend.textarea.TextStyle
public class TextStyle extends Object
A custom style class for TextSegment.

  • Field Details

    • EMPTY

      public static final TextStyle EMPTY
      Default style of text segment.

  • Constructor Details

    • TextStyle

      public TextStyle(boolean bold, boolean italic, boolean underline, int fontSize, String fontFamily, javafx.scene.paint.Color textColor, javafx.scene.paint.Color backgroundColor, int headingLevel)
      Construct a TextStyle object
      Parameters:
      bold - Sets the font weight.
      italic - Sets font style italic.
      underline - Sets text decoration underline.
      fontSize - Sets the size of the text font.
      fontFamily - Sets the font family.
      textColor - Sets the text color.
      backgroundColor - Sets the background color (highlight).
      headingLevel - Sets the type of heading (0-5), 0 = normal text.

      public TextStyle toggleBold()
      Reverse the boolean value of the bold property.
      Returns:
      TextStyle object with previous attributes except the bold property is reversed.

    • toggleStyle

      public static void toggleStyle(CustomStyledArea<ParStyle,RichSegment,TextStyle> area, TextAttribute attribute, TextStyle desiredStyle)
      Toggle a particular style selected from attribute which will be applied to area.
      Parameters:
      area - CustomStyledArea object which style to modify.
      attribute - The TextAttribute to modify.
      desiredStyle - The desired TextStyle to switch into (will only take the style specified from TextAttribute).

    • toggleHighlight

      public TextStyle toggleHighlight()
      Highlight a regular text and un-highlight already highlighted text
      Returns:
      TextStyle object with previous attributes except the highlight property is reversed.

    • isStyleFullyApplied

      public static boolean isStyleFullyApplied(CustomStyledArea<ParStyle,RichSegment,TextStyle> area, int start, int end, TextAttribute attribute, TextStyle desiredStyle)
      Check whether a style is applied fully from a selection of characters.
      Parameters:
      area - CustomStyledArea object to run the check.
      start - The starting index of the character.
      end - The ending index of the character.
      attribute - The TextAttribute of the style that is going to be checked.
      desiredStyle - The TextStyle to be compared to.
      Returns:
      True if style is fully applied, and False otherwise.

    • getStyleSelection

      public static TextStyle getStyleSelection(CustomStyledArea<ParStyle,RichSegment,TextStyle> area, int start, int end)
      Get the TextStyle from a particular text segment of CustomStyledArea. Styles will be overridden by truth-ty and bigger values if different styles are found.
      Parameters:
      area - CustomStyledArea which the TextStyle will be extracted from.
      start - The starting index of the TextStyle.
      end - The ending index of the TextStyle
      Returns:
      TextStyle of the selection from a CustomStyledArea.

    • apply

      public TextStyle apply(TextAttribute attr, TextStyle desiredStyle)
      Apply a particular style from the object TextAttribute to the TextStyle.
      Parameters:
      attr - TextAttribute, the type of style to apply.
      desiredStyle - The TextStyle object which particular style will be used to be applied.
      Returns:
      A new TextStyle object with new TextAttribute applied.

    • remove

      public TextStyle remove(TextAttribute attr)
      Remove a particular style based on the TextAttribute given
      Parameters:
      attr - TextAttribute to remove.
      Returns:
      TextStyle which TextAttribute has been removed/disabled.

    • matches

      public boolean matches(TextAttribute attr, TextStyle desiredStyle)
      Checks whether this TextStyle has the same TextAttribute with the given desired TextStyle.
      Parameters:
      attr - TextAttribute to compare.
      desiredStyle - TextStyle which will be used for comparison.
      Returns:
      True if the TextAttribute value matches and false otherwise.

      public String toString()
